title: RBI Grade B - ESI - FLM4 - Objective

quiz.text: Which scheme has been described in the above passage?
options: Atal Bhujal Yojana
Jal Jeevan Mission
National Rural Drinking Water Programme
AMRUT 2.0
Swachh Bharat Mission (Gramin)

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to above scheme?
1. Community needs to contribute 5% or 10% of capital cost for in-village infrastructure as the case may be, in cash/ kind/ and/ or labour.
2. Every village to prepare a Village Action Plan (VAP) which will have two components.
3. Technological interventions to be provided for removal of contaminants where water quality is an issue.
4. Recently (May 2023) Mission Achieved Milestone Of 10 Crore Tap Water Connections.
options: (A) Only 1, 2 and 3
(B) Only 1 and 3
(C) Only 1, 2 and 4
(D) Only 3 and 4
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which statement(s) among the following is/are correct with respect to above scheme ? 1. Andaman and Nicobar Islands is among the Union Territories (UTs) that has reported 100% coverage under the scheme. 2. It targets to provide potable water at service level of 55 litre per capita per day through Functional Household Tap Connections (FHTC) by 2024. 3. While allocating the funds to States/ UTs 20% weightage has been given to the population residing in habitations affected by chemical contaminants including Arsenic and Fluoride.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 1 and 3
(C) Only 1
(D) Only 2
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is correct with respect to above scheme?
options: Banks to not insist for collateral security for loans up to ₹5 lakh extended to units in the Micro and Small Enterprises (MSE) sector
Refinancing agency also partners with State/Regional level financial intermediaries to provide finance to Last Mile Financier of small/micro business enterprises
The disbursal of loans under the scheme increased by 34% in the first quarter of FY24
A credit card is also issued against the loan account
The Scheme is being managed by Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Micro and Small Enterprises (CGTMSE)

quiz.text:
Identify the statement(s) which is/are correct with respect to above scheme?
1. Loan proposal should be only for setting up of new Micro business enterprises.
2. There is no processing fee for loans up to ₹50,000/-.
3. Life insurance is mandatory for availing loans under the scheme.
4. Loans available for purchase of Transport Vehicle / Tractors, tillers as well as two wheelers, in case applicant intends to use vehicle for commercial purposes.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 1,2 and 3
(C) 2,3 and 4
(D) 2 and 4
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?
1. Activities allied to agriculture such as poultry, dairy, beekeeping etc are also included under the scheme.
2. A refinancing agency is formed under the scheme which is also a direct lending institution, it provides refinance support to its intermediaries.
3.  Loans under the scheme cannot be extended by Small Finance Banks.
4. No subsidy for loan given, however, if loan proposal is linked to some Government scheme, wherein the Govt. if providing capital subsidy, it will be eligible for subsidy.
options: (A) Only 1 and 4
(B) Only 1, 3 and 4
(C) Only 2 and 3
(D) Only 1, 2 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme? 1. Ministry of Women and Child Development is the nodal ministry for the scheme. 2. Investment under the scheme is in multiples of Rs. 1000. 3. Tenure of the scheme is 1st April 2023 to 31st March 2025.
options: Only 1
Only 3
Only 1 and 3
1, 2 and 3
Only 2

quiz.text: Which among the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to above scheme?1. An individual can open only 1 account.2. Maximum investment limit is Rs 2 lakh under the scheme.3. Recently (July 2023) Bank of Maharashtra becomes first bank to offer Savings Certificate under the scheme.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) Only 1 and 3
(D) Only 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text:
Which statement(s) among the following is/are correct with respect to above scheme?
1. Account can be closed before maturity only on the death of the account holder.
2. Premature closure of account allowed at any time after 6 months of opening but with interest rate reduced by 2%.
3. Partial withdrawal is allowed after 6 months from date of account opening but before account's maturity.
4. In case of partial withdrawal account holder can withdraw a maximum of 50% of the balance.
options: (A) Only 1, 2 and 4
(B) Only 2 and 3
(C) Only 3 and 4
(D) Only 2
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the programme management structure of the above scheme? 1. A Monitoring Committee headed by the Cabinet Secretary. 2. Digital India Advisory Group chaired by Minister of Communications and IT. 3. An Apex Committee chaired by the by Prime Minister.
options: Only 1
Only 2
Only 3
Both 1 and 2
Both 1 and 3

quiz.text:
Which among the followings are under key pillar of the Digital India scheme?

1. Broadband Highways

2. Post Harvest Programmes

3.  e-Governance: Reforming Govt. through Technology

4. Private Internet Access Programme

5. Universal Access to Mobile Connectivity
options: Only 1, 3 and 5
Only 1, 2 and 3
Only 1, 2, 3 and 5
Only 2, 3 and 5
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is correct with respect to Pre Matric Scholarship scheme for OBCs, EBCs and DNTs?
options: Only 1 boy of the same parents/guardian will be entitled to receive scholarships.
Only 2 girls of the same parents/guardian will be entitled to receive scholarships.
Students should be studying in Class IX and X on a full-time basis in Government Schools only.
Student may be getting any other scholarship.
At least 10% students with disabilities should be covered for grant of the scholarships.

quiz.text: Which among the following are sub-schemes under the India Semiconductor Mission (ISM)?
options: Modified Scheme for setting up of Semiconductor Fabs in India
Modified Scheme for setting up of Display Tabs in India
Design Linked Incentive (DLI) Scheme
A and C
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with respect to the Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF) Scheme? 1. Rs. 1 Lakh Crore will be provided by banks and financial institutions as loans to eligible beneficiaries. 2. Interest subvention of 4% per annum up to a limit of loans of Rs. 2 Crore. 3. Moratorium for repayment may vary subject to minimum 6 months and maximum of 18 months.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana? 1. The account will be valid for 18 years from the date of opening. 2. Deposits in a Sukanya Samriddhi account may be made till the completion of 18 years, from the date of opening of the account. 3. Sukanya Samriddhi account can be opened up to age of 10 years only from the date of birth. 4. A parent or guardian can open only one account per girl child.
options: 1, 2 and 3
2 and 3
3 and 4
1, 2 and 4
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is correct with respect to the criteria to become an incubator under the Startup India Seed Fund?
options: Incubator must have facilities to seat at least 50 individuals.
Incubator must have at least 15 startups undergoing incubation physically on the date of application.
Incubator should not be disbursing seed fund to incubatees using funding from any third-party private entity.
Incubator should be operational for at least three years on the date of application to the scheme.
In case the incubator not assisted by Central or State Government, it must present audited annual reports for the last 3 years.

quiz.text: Which of the following statement (s) is/are correct with reference to the Rural Self Employment Training Institutes scheme? 1. It consist of 3-way partnership between the Ministry of Rural Development (MoRD), Ministry of Panchayati Raj and State Governments. 2. it is a sub-scheme of National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM). 3. At least 50% of the trainees should be from the rural Below Poverty Line (BPL) category .
options: 1 and 2 only
Only 2
Only 3
Only 2 and 3
All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the key result areas of the Skill Acquisition and Knowledge Awareness for Livelihood Promotion (SANKALP)?

1. It provides Institutional Strengthening at Central, State and Block level.

2. Quality Assurance of skill development programmes.

3. Inclusion of marginalized population in skill development programmes.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the Amrit Dharohar Scheme? 1. Ministry of Jal Shakti is the nodal ministry for the scheme. 2. Resources for implementation of the Amrit Dharohar to be obtained through convergence of other ongoing schemes/programmes of Central and State Governments. 3. It will be applicable for a 2023-24 to 2026-27.
options: Only 2
1 and 3
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (In July 2023), the report, X was prepared by International Organization for Migration (IOM) and François-Xavier Bagnoud Center for Health and Human Rights at Harvard University, according to the report __________ of child victims were female and __________ were male.
options: 60.5% and 45.6%
50% and 40%
57.4% and 42.6%
55.4% and 43.6%
44.8% and 55.6%

quiz.text: Recently (In July 2023) International Organization for Migration (IOM) released a report titled “From Evidence to Action: Twenty Years of IOM Child Trafficking Data to Inform Policy and Programming”. Consider the following statements regarding data given in the report.A. Sexual exploitation, including through prostitution, pornography, and sexual servitude, is also prominent, affecting 50% of trafficked children, predominantly girls.B. Child victims reported being exploited in domestic work (19.5%)C. Child victims reported being exploited in begging (20.2%)Which of the following statements are incorrect?
options: Only A
Only B
Both A and B
Both A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per the recently (In July 2023) released X Index, in India ________ poor people moved out of poverty from 2005/2006 to 2019/2021 (In span of 15 years), with incidence falling from 55.1% in 2005/2006 to ________ in 2019/2021.
options: 415 million and 16.4%
1.1 billion and 18%
600 million and 27%
314 million and 23%
413 million and 16.7%

quiz.text: Recently (In July 2023), the Global Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) was released by the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) and the Oxford Poverty and Human Development Initiative (OPHI). Consider the following statements regarding the “Global Multidimensional Poverty Index”.A. The Global Multidimensional Poverty Index has 4 dimension and 11 indicatorsB. According to the findings the poverty rate among children is 27.7%, while among adults, it is 13.4%C. Assets is not one of the indicator on which Global MPI is based.Which of the above statement is incorrect?
options: Only A
Both A and C
Only B
Both A and B
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (In July 2023), “A world of debt, a growing burden to global prosperity July 2023” report was released by the UN Global Crisis Response Group and the five UN Regional Commissions. Consider the following statements regarding the findings of the report.A. Developing countries owe almost 50% of the global public debt.B. 59 developing countries face a debt-to-GDP ratio above 60%C. India's total debt according to the report is US $2815 billionWhich of the above statements are correct?
options: Only A
Only B
Both A and B
Both B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, __________ is set to become a full member by 2024.
options: Bangladesh
Japan
Belarus
Syria
Egypt

quiz.text: NESTS has recently released notification for EMRS Staff Selection Exam (ESSE) -2023 for filling up 4062 vacancies.Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to NESTS?1.      NESTS stands for ‘National Education Society for Tribal Students’.2.      NESTS was established in 2018.3.      It has a mandate to manage Eklavya Schools
options: 1 and 3
2 and 3
1 and 2
3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to SDRF?1.      The State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) is constituted under Section 48 (1) (a) of the Disaster Management Act, 2005.2.      The SDRF was formed in accordance with the recommendations of the 12th Finance Commission.3.      Funding to SDRF: 60:40 (Centre: states) for general category states, 90% for special category states and UTs (Northeast and Hilly states/UTs).
options: 1 and 3
1 only
3 only
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text: As per recent (July 2023) news, the Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances (DARPG) has released the Centralized Public Grievance Redressal and Monitoring System (CPGRAMS) monthly report for June, 2023. New and comprehensive Grievance Redressal Assessment and Index (GRAI) has which of the following dimensions?1.      Efficiency2.      Feedback3.      Domain4.      Organizational Commitment
options: 1 and 3
1, 2 and 3
1, 3 and 4
None of the above
1, 2, 3 and 4

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the Department of legal affairs has formed an expert committee to recommend reforms to the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, _________.
options: 2006
2012
1992
1999
1996

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), which of the following entities has launched Nandi (NOC Approval for New Drug and Inoculation System) portal?
options: Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
Ministry of Tourism
World Health Organization
Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
Moderna Inc.
